channel.title: [urgent help!] [delta] drops
channel.description:
I've been having this problem for a while. I think I've found the file which the problem is occurring. It may be in ItemHandler.class but I'm not sure.
Every few hours the drops turn off. As in, you can't pickup items and when you drop an item, it disappears.
I've tried to get help with this before, but no one attempted to.
Thanks.

item.title: [urgent help!] [delta] drops
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Does it say anything when you drop it?

Read full topic
